name: game-999
description: Game 999 - Complete Gaming Application with Web and Mobile support

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../frontend_andriod && flutter pub get
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:android
scripts.setup:git: git add . && git commit -m "Game 999: Complete setup with web deployment"
scripts.clean: cd frontend_andriod && flutter clean && flutter pub get

author: Game 999 Team
